items.sentence: It didn't take long for Tom to figure out something was wrong.
Tom doesn't sleep in class every day, but he does quite often.
I don't like the new textbook we're using in our French class.
My wife usually doesn't drink coffee at night. I don't either.
I still have some things that I need to do before I can leave.
Follow this road until you cross a bridge, and then turn left.
Do you know anything about the history or origin of this flag?
Tom has had numerous opportunities to set the record straight.
Let's hope that the same thing doesn't happen again this year.
You should tell Tom that Mary is planning on joining the team.
You ought to tell Tom that you're planning on taking pictures.
It isn't necessary to make a decision now about where to meet.
If I had known your telephone number, I would have called you.
You are way too intelligent to think you'd be smarter than me.
Our electricity was cut off because we forgot to pay the bill.
My back hurts from sitting for hours in front of the computer.
Tom said he was sorry that he'd hurt Mary's friend's feelings.
It takes a special kind of person to work in those conditions.
The length of days and the length of years hardly vary at all.
Tell me why you aren't planning on going to Australia with us.
